ygData.subject: Re: Banshee Aura
ygData.msgSnippet: These spells are only made through research here are the recipies banshee aura: Dissolution Imitation Harm shield: Refuge Absorbtion Dont research them untill
ygData.messageBody:
These spells are only made through research here are the recipies
banshee aura: Dissolution Imitation
Harm shield: Refuge Absorbtion
Dont research them untill your level 16 for banshee and level 20 for harm
shield the words will cost you much less and words go from 1 to 2pp so it is
cheaper and they are not rare some people can't get rid of words
